title: Little Forest: Summer/Autumn
occurrences: "Little Forest" is divided into 4 parts - Summer, Autumn, Winter and Spring. After the end credits of "Summer", "Autumn" follows. After that, the trailer of "Winter - Spring" will be shown. Please enjoy the continuity of the movies.
Komori (Little Forest) is a small settlement in a village somewhere in the Tohoku region.
